languages.text: Механический ковчег "Герметико", считавшийся потерянным много десятилетий назад, вновь объявился в освоенных системах Простора. Необходимо отыскать его в Зеркальной системе и высадить на борт десантную группу.

The Ark Mechanicus Hermetico, presumed to have been lost decades ago, has reappeared in the known systems of the Koronus Expanse. The first step is to reach its location in System Speculo and send a boarding shuttle to the Hermetico.
languages.original_text: Механический ковчег "Герметико", считавшийся потерянным много десятилетий назад, вновь объявился в освоенных системах Простора. Необходимо отыскать его в Зеркальной системе и высадить на борт десантную группу.

traits.locale_text: The Ark Mechanicus Hermetico, presumed to have been lost decades ago, has reappeared in the known systems of the Koronus Expanse. The first step is to reach its location and send a boarding shuttle to the Hermetico.

The Ark Mechanicus Hermetico, presumed to have been lost decades ago, has reappeared in the known systems of the Koronus Expanse. The first step is to reach its location in System Speculo and send a boarding shuttle to the Hermetico.

The Ark Mechanicus Hermetico, presumed to have been lost decades ago, has reappeared in the known systems of the Koronus Expanse. The first step is to reach its location and send a boarding shuttle to the Hermetico.

The Ark Mechanicus Hermetico, presumed to have been lost decades ago, has reappeared in the known systems of the Koronus Expanse. The first step is to reach its location in System Speculo and send a boarding shuttle to the Hermetico.

languages.text: L'Arche Mechanicus Hermetico, portée disparue depuis des décennies, vient de réapparaître dans les systèmes connus des Étendues de Koronus. Il faut tout d'abord se rendre là où elle a été aperçue, dans le système de Speculo, et y envoyer une navette d'abordage.
languages.original_text: The Ark Mechanicus Hermetico, presumed to have been lost decades ago, has reappeared in the known systems of the Koronus Expanse. The first step is to reach its location in System Speculo and send a boarding shuttle to the Hermetico.

traits.locale_text: L'Arche Mechanicus Hermetico, portée disparue depuis des décennies, vient de réapparaître dans les systèmes connus des Étendues de Koronus. Il faut tout d'abord se rendre là où elle a été aperçue et y envoyer une navette d'abordage.

languages.text: 早在几十年前便失踪的机械方舟“隐士之舟号”，再次出现在了科罗努斯扩区的斯派克星系。行商浪人需要抵达该星系，之后派遣穿梭机前往隐士之舟号。
languages.original_text: The Ark Mechanicus Hermetico, presumed to have been lost decades ago, has reappeared in the known systems of the Koronus Expanse. The first step is to reach its location in System Speculo and send a boarding shuttle to the Hermetico.

traits.locale_text: 早在几十年前便失踪的机械方舟“隐士之舟号”，再次出现在了科罗努斯扩区的已知星系。行商浪人需要抵达该星系，之后派遣穿梭机前往隐士之舟号。

languages.text: アーク・メカニカスのヘルメティコは数十年前に行方不明になっていたと思われていたが、コロヌス・エクスパンスの既知の星系に再び姿を現した。まずはスペキュロ星系のその場所へと到達し、ヘルメティコに乗船シャトルを送る必要がある。
languages.original_text: The Ark Mechanicus Hermetico, presumed to have been lost decades ago, has reappeared in the known systems of the Koronus Expanse. The first step is to reach its location in System Speculo and send a boarding shuttle to the Hermetico.

traits.locale_text: アーク・メカニカスのヘルメティコは数十年前に行方不明になっていたと思われていたが、コロヌス・エクスパンスの既知の星系に再び姿を現した。まずはスペキュロ星系のその場所へと到達し、ヘルメティコに乗船シャトルを送る必要がある。

languages.text: Die Mechanicus-Arche Hermetico, von der man glaubte, sie sei vor Jahrzehnten zerstört worden, ist plötzlich wieder in den bekannten Systemen der Koronus-Ausdehnung aufgetaucht. Der erste Schritt ist es, zu den Koordinaten der Hermetico im System Speculo zu reisen und ein Boarding-Shuttle zu ihr zu schicken.
languages.original_text: The Ark Mechanicus Hermetico, presumed to have been lost decades ago, has reappeared in the known systems of the Koronus Expanse. The first step is to reach its location in System Speculo and send a boarding shuttle to the Hermetico.

traits.locale_text: Die Mechanicus-Arche Hermetico, von der man glaubte, sie sei vor Jahrzehnten zerstört worden, ist plötzlich wieder in den bekannten Systemen der Koronus-Ausdehnung aufgetaucht. Der erste Schritt ist es, zu den Koordinaten der Hermetico zu reisen und ein Boarding-Shuttle zu ihr zu schicken.

languages.text: El Arca del Mechanicus Hermetico, que se creía desaparecida hace décadas, ha reaparecido en los sistemas conocidos de la Extensión de Koronus. El primer paso es llegar a su posición en el sistema Speculo y enviar una lanzadera de abordaje a la Hermetico.
languages.original_text: The Ark Mechanicus Hermetico, presumed to have been lost decades ago, has reappeared in the known systems of the Koronus Expanse. The first step is to reach its location in System Speculo and send a boarding shuttle to the Hermetico.

traits.locale_text: El Arca del Mechanicus Hermetico, que se suponía desaparecida hace décadas, ha reaparecido en los sistemas conocidos de la Extensión de Koronus. El primer paso es llegar a su posición y enviar una lanzadera de abordaje a la Hermetico.

languages.text: On yıllar önce kaybolduğu varsayılan Ark Mechanicus Hermetico, Koronus Enginliği'nin bilinen sistemleri arasında yeniden belirdi. İlk adım, Speculo Sistemi'ndeki konumuna ulaşıp Hermetico'ya bir mekik yollamak olacak.
languages.original_text: The Ark Mechanicus Hermetico, presumed to have been lost decades ago, has reappeared in the known systems of the Koronus Expanse. The first step is to reach its location in System Speculo and send a boarding shuttle to the Hermetico.
